scripts.test:fs-persistence:all: npm run test:fs-persistence:1 && npm run test:fs-persistence:3
scripts.test:fs-persistence:1: npx rimraf ./persistence && concurrently --success first "node lib/fs-persistence/server.js --darlean-app-id=server01 --darlean-runtime-apps=server01" "node lib/fs-persistence/client.js --darlean-app-id=client --darlean-runtime-apps=server01 && npm run kill"
scripts.test:fs-persistence:3: npx rimraf ./persistence && concurrently --success first "node lib/fs-persistence/server.js --darlean-app-id=server01 --darlean-runtime-apps=server01,server02,server03" "node lib/fs-persistence/server.js --darlean-app-id=server02 --darlean-runtime-apps=server01,server02,server03" "node lib/fs-persistence/server.js --darlean-app-id=server03 --darlean-runtime-apps=server01,server02,server03" "node lib/fs-persistence/client.js --darlean-app-id=client --darlean-runtime-apps=server01,server02,server03 && npm run kill"
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm install && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --skipErrorChecking --json typedoc-out.json &  npx docgen typedoc-out.json ./docs/
